# eslint/no-ternary <Badge type="info" text="Style" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Disallow ternary operators

### Why is this bad?

The ternary operator is used to conditionally assign a value to a variable. Some believe that the use of ternary operators leads to unclear code.

### Example

```javascript
var foo = isBar ? baz : qux;
```

- [Rule Source](https://github.com/oxc-project/oxc/blob/36ebb3e7841818c238c44349d6cf859db4177d55/crates/oxc_linter/src/rules/eslint/no_ternary.rs)
